description:
Welcome to Flash Animation and ActionScript Course.

In this Course,There are up to 78 lectures with 10 hours video which will help you to put your knowledge to the next level in Animation and ActionScript.

Do you want to improve your skill in animation and want to become a professional designer then this course is best for you.In this course you will learn all the basic things of flash for making an animation.

In this Course you will not only learn Animation you'll also learn ActionScript which is a Popular Programming Language, this language can help you to learn to make ActionScript based projects like Games,Image slider,Progress Bar & Presentations etc.
title: Flash Animation and ActionScript Course in Hindi/Urdu
